examples: the way he turns on the television as soon as he walks in drives me nuts

exclamation.description: An expression of contempt or derision.
examples: keep up the good work, and nuts to everyone who doesn't like it

phrases: Andrew, 33, is nuts about classic Harley Davidson motorcycles and little Harley is already following in his footsteps with her own quad bike.
Asia is nuts about video games, but for console manufacturers some regional markets are too small, too poor - or too risky - for distribution.
One of my dining companions is nuts about the lentil soup so we all shared a bowl of that.
The person I knew was nuts about horses, her whole life was horses.
